motd.title: Message of the Day
motd.body:
Not receiving the Experience awarded at the end of the match? Contact DN_Zeuxis on Discord and give him the following information: - A screenshot of the reward screen - A screenshot of the experience on the ship, after the match - If possible, a screenshot of before the match - The date and time it happened at
